entries.command_guard: I want you to guard and defend.
entries.command_friend: Accept this person's orders as if they came from me.
entries.command_transfer: I am transferring command of you to this individual.
entries.confused: Sir, I am unclear on your orders, sir.
entries.start_convo_4: Yes, sir. What word do you want me to listen for?
entries.end_convo: Yes, sir. When I hear that command, I'll do it.
entries.command_reply_1: I need to teach you how I give orders.
entries.which_command: Yes, sir. Which order do you want to instruct me in?
entries.taming_toofar: You are too far away to continue taming.
entries.taming_fail: You fail to tame the creature.
